question: NTPC has signed a Rs 3,000-crore term loan agreement with which bank for partially funding its capital expenditure?
explanation: The state-owned NTPC has signed a term loan agreement for Rs. 3,000 crore with ICICI Bank for partially funding its capital expenditure. The loan which has a door-to-door tenure of 15 years will be utilised to part finance the capital expenditure of NTPC.
